meanings.definition: In a way that relates to antigens.
meanings.sent1: The vaccine was designed to work antigenically against the virus.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how the flu shot would function antigenically in my body.
meanings.sent3: The flu virus tried to sneak past my body's defenses, but the vaccine antigenically fought back.
meanings.sent4: The immune system responded antigenically to the foreign invader, protecting the body.
meanings.sent5: The antibodies recognized the intruder antigenically, launching a defense mechanism.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of an antigen.
meanings.sent1: The antigenically active cells triggered an immune response in the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the antigenically diverse strains of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The antigenically unique protein caught the attention of researchers.
